meanings.definition: A substance added to a material to make it softer or more flexible.
meanings.sent1: The plasticizers in the rubber helped make it bend easily.
meanings.sent2: The manufacturer used plasticizers to make the plastic more pliable.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy thought the plasticizers in the toy made it extra squishy.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a plasticizer, softening his heart towards forgiveness.
meanings.sent5: The warm sun melted the plasticizers in the toy, creating a gooey mess.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound that is used to increase the plasticity or fluidity of a material.
meanings.sent1: The scientist mixed the plasticizers into the solution to make it more fluid.
meanings.sent2: Plasticizers are commonly used in the production of paints to enhance their flow.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand seemed to contain a secret ingredient - plasticizers!
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as plasticizers, smoothing the conversation's flow.
meanings.sent5: The artist skillfully added plasticizers to the paint, creating a masterpiece with smooth strokes.
